title: PORCUPINE
description: Porcupines are rodents. There are two families of porcupines, Hystricidae (Old World Porcupines) and Erethizontidae (New World Porcupines). There are many similarities between the two families.Those found in Sri Lanka belong to the Genus Hystrix. The Indian Crested Porcupine, found in Sri Lanka, has as its scientific name Hystrix indica. It is called Ittawa in Sinhala and Mullam Pandi in Tamil. The meaning of the Tamil name is prickly pig.
